response.original_title: An Acquiring Mind: Philippe de Montebello and The Metropolitan Museum of Art
response.overview: The extraordinary legacy of Philippe de Montebello, who served for 31 years as Director of The Metropolitan Museum of Art, is chronicled in this one-hour documentary. During his tenure, Mr. de Montebello guided the acquisition of more than 84,000 works of art from around the globe, demanded innovation in conservation techniques and oversaw the doubling of the physical size of this world-renowned cultural institution
response.title: An Acquiring Mind: Philippe de Montebello and The Metropolitan Museum of Art
